summary: hannah !! i just recently came back from a trip to disney and ohmygod there were some adorable little kids there some girls were...
question: hannah !! i just recently came back from a trip to disney and ohmygod there were some adorable little kids there some girls were dressed as princesses and some boys were superheroes but there was one girl who was wearing a snow white dress (if i remember correctly) and she was running away from her dad,, (she was the youngest),, as they waited to board the dumbo ride her siblings were with their mom laughing and that would literally be harry as a dad it was too cute and just extremely soft 😭💖
answer:
lovie !! disneyland is the best and i’ve only been there one and i want to come back again as this being one of the reasons and i’m so soft??? like harry’d be so all for it and he’s gonna be even more excited to dress her up! baby girl styles would have the complete get-up and he’d be even the one to fix her hair and all that!

bonus:

harry renting disneyland just so his family can have it to themselves for a bit and he’d be giving them the A+ treatment!! renting the hotel out, going in rides even if he feels like his soul alreadly left his body even before he can go in the ride, and guess what he’d say to his youngest,,,

“m’favorite princess of all time, bub.”

title: Accepting Chaos
body:
Olivia Rivers and Harry Styles are the best of friends. Growing up together was easy but falling in love was unexpected.

Mint Chocolate Chip

“Why are we under the covers?” The static was making my hair stick to the covers everywhere so I attempted to pull it over one shoulder.“This is the only place I don’t think the paps will find…

Read more…

summary: Chapter two PREVIOUS PART       -      NEXT PART _________ You woke up the next day by your phone ringing. You groaned, cursing...
body:
Chapter two

PREVIOUS PART       -      NEXT PART

_________

You woke up the next day by your phone ringing. You groaned, cursing under your breath. You had a day off and you were about to rip your publicist head off for calling you before 12.

You grabbed your phone still laying down and looked at the caller-ID. ‘Harry Styles’ it said and you felt butterflies in your stomach. Your earlier frustration gone.

‘Hello?’ You asked your voice still groggy from sleeping. You cleared your throat while laughing. ‘Hello.’ You said again now in your normal voice.

You heard laughing from the other end of the phone. ‘Did I wake you?’ Harry asked.

‘No, I am in the middle of puberty so my voice breaks sometimes.’ You answered ironically. ‘Yes, you woke me up. So, it better be good.’ You said teasing.

‘I am really sorry for waking you but I wanted to ask if you wanted to grab some lunch together and in my defence, it is already 11.30. ‘

‘11.30 is way too early to wake me on my days off, remember that. But because you only know me for a day I will let it slide this one time. But don’t expect me to be so friendly next time.’ You said while getting out of bed. You walked to your bathroom to look at yourself in the mirror.

‘Should I be afraid?’ He asked laughing a little bit. ‘Very.’ You said while fixing the bird nest that is your hair at the moment.

‘But lunch? I am up for that.’ You said no longer joking around. You really wanted to go to lunch with Harry. You had such a good time last night. You really liked him.

‘Great!’ Harry said. ‘How does 12.30 sound?’ He asked.

‘Perfect.’ You said, maybe a little too enthusiastic. You slapped your hand against your forehead. Either Harry didn’t notice or didn’t want to embarrass you but he didn’t comment on your answer.

‘Great, then I will come pick you up.’ He said. You told him the address of your hotel and you both said your goodbyes.

You dropped your phone on the bed and went to take a shower. When you came back into your room, your phone was blowing up. You saw that you had multiple missed calls from your friends. You kind of started panicking. What if something bad happened to one of them?

You opened facetime and called the group chat. Their faces popped up. ‘What happened? Is everybody okay?’ You asked, worry very clear in your voice.

‘We are fine, but you have some explaining to do.’ Charlie said. Charlie, or Charles, is an old high school friend of yours. He is now in his last year in college, studying photography in New York and he is honestly amazing.

‘What do you mean?’ You asked them, very confused.

‘The fact that you had a date and we did not know about it.’ Simone said. Simone has always lived in the house next to yours and you had been friends for forever. She studied business in Uni and now works on Wall Street.

‘A date?’ You were looking at them like they just told you the funniest joke ever. You weren’t really the big ‘dating’ type since your career demands so much of you, you don’t really see the point in doing it. You did however were friends with a lot of people in the industry, men included.

‘Yes, your date night with none other than Harry Styles.’ Lilly said in a duh-tone. Lilly, or Lillian, was a friend you met on camp when you were both 7 years old. You have stayed in touch since and always went on camp together since then. She also lives in NYC, she was born and raised in the city and takes pride in the fact.

‘What are you talking about I did not go on a date with Harry Styles.’ You said now laughing.

‘There is picture prove my darling, the daily mail posted pictures of you two leaving a restaurant together.’ Annie explained. Finally, there is Annie. She is your Makeup and hairstylist. Originally from Germany, but she now lives in LA. She was in Germany at the moment with her family. She has two children, a girl named Harper and a boy named Tom but we all call him Tommy.

It is amazing how these four people who have nothing in common, except for being friends with you, are so close. You couldn’t be happier though. You loved them all so much.

‘Oh God, I went to dinner with Nick and Harry happened to be there. It was not a date.’ You said, rolling your eyes. Let it be them to listen to gossip. They all love gossip a little bit too much.

‘But you met him, right? How was he? Did you guys talk?’ Simone asked while clapping her hands.

You rolled your eyes again and they landed on the clock on your computer. 12.10 am. ‘Shit’ You said. ‘Hey guys, I am going for lunch with Harry and he is coming to pick me up in like 20 minutes. I will call you later.’ You said and when you closed the chat you could hear a lot of protest.

You texted them all you will talk later and you started getting ready for lunch. In the back of your mind you couldn’t help but wonder ‘Is this a date?’

.

Harry picked you up and you both left the hotel by using the back exit. It is not that you had to hide anything, but it made you think that Harry had also seen the rumor that has been going around. And honestly you weren’t really up for giving the paps more to make up rumours.

‘So, I was thinking we could go to this small sandwich shop. Since you haven’t eaten yet today, I don’t think you would be in the mood for like a full on lunch menu.’ Harry said while driving out of the hotel parking lot. You couldn’t help smiling at that. He is such a thoughtful person, it made you feel butterflies in your stomach.

‘A sandwich sounds perfect.’ You said.

You had some small talk in the car. Just the usual how are you, no headache from last night, …

When you arrived at the Sandwich shop and it was honestly so cute. It looked really old from the outside but once you walked inside, it looked super cosy. You both took a seat and ordered your sandwiches.

“So, you seen the rumor yet?” Harry asked cautiously. “I haven’t seen it yet, but my friends called me earlier all freaking out like ‘You went on a date with Harry Styles ‘. “You said mimicking Charlies voice.

Harry laughed. “They are big fans by the way.” You said.

“That’s nice to hear, but what is more important to me is if you are a fan.” Harry asked. He looked at you with his beautiful green eyes. They held a bit of mischief in them while he asked the question.

You really had to concentrate not to start blushing because got his accent and those beautiful green eyes would make you blush like a tomato.

“Oh massive, I really need to hold back now because I would jump on you right now.” You said jokingly. Harry laughed at that.

At that moment, the waiter showed up and handed you your sandwiches. You thanked him.

“Jokes aside, I am a fan of yours. I loved your album and I even went to one of your concerts.” You said, taking the first bite of your meal.

“Really? Nobody ever told me you were there.” Harry said, surprise in his voice.

“Well, that is because I did not order VIP-tickets. When I go to concert I normally order normal seated tickets, I just love being in the crowd surrounded by other fans and just enjoy the concert. “You said.

Harry looked at you, well more like studied you and now you couldn’t help the small blush on your cheeks.

“What?” You asked him. “Nothing. You are just something else.” Harry said.

“Well I hope that is meant in a positive way.” You said. “Yes, certainly in a positive way.” Harry said with a small smile on his face.

The rest of the lunch went by very quickly and you both decided to take a walk. You had such a good time with Harry. You both got along so well and natural. You loved that you both had the same sense of humor.

The only thing that worried you were those butterflies in your stomach who didn’t want to settle. You weren’t ready to fall for him; your career was demanding too much of you right now to be in a relationship.

______

Thank you so much for reading, please let me know what you think!

_____

MASTERLIST     -     NEXT PART

You dropped your phone on the bed and went to take a shower. When you came back into your room, your phone was blowing up. You saw that you had multiple missed calls from your friends. You kind of started panicking. What if something bad happened to one of them?

You opened facetime and called the group chat. Their faces popped up. ‘What happened? Is everybody okay?’ You asked, worry very clear in your voice.

‘We are fine, but you have some explaining to do.’ Charlie said. Charlie, or Charles, is an old high school friend of yours. He is now in his last year in college, studying photography in New York and he is honestly amazing.

‘What do you mean?’ You asked them, very confused.

‘The fact that you had a date and we did not know about it.’ Simone said. Simone has always lived in the house next to yours and you had been friends for forever. She studied business in Uni and now works on Wall Street.

‘A date?’ You were looking at them like they just told you the funniest joke ever. You weren’t really the big ‘dating’ type since your career demands so much of you, you don’t really see the point in doing it. You did however were friends with a lot of people in the industry, men included.

‘Yes, your date night with none other than Harry Styles.’ Lilly said in a duh-tone. Lilly, or Lillian, was a friend you met on camp when you were both 7 years old. You have stayed in touch since and always went on camp together since then. She also lives in NYC, she was born and raised in the city and takes pride in the fact.

‘What are you talking about I did not go on a date with Harry Styles.’ You said now laughing.

‘There is picture prove my darling, the daily mail posted pictures of you two leaving a restaurant together.’ Annie explained. Finally, there is Annie. She is your Makeup and hairstylist. Originally from Germany, but she now lives in LA. She was in Germany at the moment with her family. She has two children, a girl named Harper and a boy named Tom but we all call him Tommy.

It is amazing how these four people who have nothing in common, except for being friends with you, are so close. You couldn’t be happier though. You loved them all so much.

‘Oh God, I went to dinner with Nick and Harry happened to be there. It was not a date.’ You said, rolling your eyes. Let it be them to listen to gossip. They all love gossip a little bit too much.

‘But you met him, right? How was he? Did you guys talk?’ Simone asked while clapping her hands.

You rolled your eyes again and they landed on the clock on your computer. 12.10 am. ‘Shit’ You said. ‘Hey guys, I am going for lunch with Harry and he is coming to pick me up in like 20 minutes. I will call you later.’ You said and when you closed the chat you could hear a lot of protest.

You texted them all you will talk later and you started getting ready for lunch. In the back of your mind you couldn’t help but wonder ‘Is this a date?’

.

Harry picked you up and you both left the hotel by using the back exit. It is not that you had to hide anything, but it made you think that Harry had also seen the rumor that has been going around. And honestly you weren’t really up for giving the paps more to make up rumours.

‘So, I was thinking we could go to this small sandwich shop. Since you haven’t eaten yet today, I don’t think you would be in the mood for like a full on lunch menu.’ Harry said while driving out of the hotel parking lot. You couldn’t help smiling at that. He is such a thoughtful person, it made you feel butterflies in your stomach.

‘A sandwich sounds perfect.’ You said.

You had some small talk in the car. Just the usual how are you, no headache from last night, …

When you arrived at the Sandwich shop and it was honestly so cute. It looked really old from the outside but once you walked inside, it looked super cosy. You both took a seat and ordered your sandwiches.

“So, you seen the rumor yet?” Harry asked cautiously. “I haven’t seen it yet, but my friends called me earlier all freaking out like ‘You went on a date with Harry Styles ‘. “You said mimicking Charlies voice.

Harry laughed. “They are big fans by the way.” You said.

“That’s nice to hear, but what is more important to me is if you are a fan.” Harry asked. He looked at you with his beautiful green eyes. They held a bit of mischief in them while he asked the question.

You really had to concentrate not to start blushing because got his accent and those beautiful green eyes would make you blush like a tomato.

“Oh massive, I really need to hold back now because I would jump on you right now.” You said jokingly. Harry laughed at that.

At that moment, the waiter showed up and handed you your sandwiches. You thanked him.

“Jokes aside, I am a fan of yours. I loved your album and I even went to one of your concerts.” You said, taking the first bite of your meal.

“Really? Nobody ever told me you were there.” Harry said, surprise in his voice.

“Well, that is because I did not order VIP-tickets. When I go to concert I normally order normal seated tickets, I just love being in the crowd surrounded by other fans and just enjoy the concert. “You said.

Harry looked at you, well more like studied you and now you couldn’t help the small blush on your cheeks.

“What?” You asked him. “Nothing. You are just something else.” Harry said.

“Well I hope that is meant in a positive way.” You said. “Yes, certainly in a positive way.” Harry said with a small smile on his face.

The rest of the lunch went by very quickly and you both decided to take a walk. You had such a good time with Harry. You both got along so well and natural. You loved that you both had the same sense of humor.

The only thing that worried you were those butterflies in your stomach who didn’t want to settle. You weren’t ready to fall for him; your career was demanding too much of you right now to be in a relationship.

______

Thank you so much for reading, please let me know what you think!

_____

title: Go to Hell Part III
body:
A/N: Part three to a VERY angsty short series, thanks to everyone who has been requesting it!! 

Tags: angst, swearing 

MASTERLIST 

Part 1 + Part 2


+++


She woke up with a pounding headache and an unfamiliar weight of an arm draped over her body. When [Y/N] started to gain a bit more consciousness, she could feel a dull sting around in eyes. The antics of last night’s mishaps were something she was oblivious to and there wasn’t that much she could remember.

As soon as her eyes are open and that she’s fully awake, [Y/N] looks around the space and recognises that she actually in her own room. Now raising more questions of how she ended up here in the first place. Not remembering when she came home, how she got home or who with. But, she thought it were best if she didn’t ponder on those topics too much.

[Y/N] carefully sits up and turns out that the person sleeping beside her is actually Mark. She was thankful it was someone she actually had a chance of getting to know, slightly, and not some stranger from tinder. Hopping right out of her bed, [Y/N] heads to the towel cupboard and gathered some fresh clothes for after her shower.

The shower was defiantly refreshing, but it wasn’t able to wipe away last night. As she stands with the water running on her body, all she can think about are those eyes. The green pair that stared straight into hers with no feelings, no lust or emotion. Just an empty drive to plough someone in front of her. Seeing the way her body was reacting against Harry’s touch made [Y/N]’s blood boil.

Harry.

She hadn’t spent much time thinking about him after their breakup, afraid of confronting the pain and hurt that breakups require you to endure. It’s natural to hurt, but some people decided not to feel that by choosing to do things that make them forget about it temporarily. [Y/N] was guilty of that.

She shut the water off, stepping out of the shower before drying herself off and putting on the comfy clothes. Looking into the foggy mirror in front of her, she can see that she still has some of last night’s makeup on, deciding to wash it off with some cold water from the tap.

        “Oh morning.” Mark chirps brightly as she walks out from her bathroom.

        “Morning.” She replies in a less upbeat tone of voice than Mark.

          “You feeling alright?” He asks her.

          “I’ll be honest; not amazing. But that’s what I get for drinking too much.” [Y/N] answers.

           “Too much? Pretty sure you had the entire bar.” Mark laughed with an sheepish grin on his face. It made her want to bury herself into the cover in embarrassment 

          “Guess I did some pretty stupid shit then.” [Y/N] lets out a sigh. Mark looked to the side for a moment, flattening his lips.

          “Stupid might be a little bit of an understatement.” He said with as much honesty as he could.

        “For fuck sakes.” [Y/N] groans. She knew very well that she didn’t like getting drunk, at least not that drunk anyways. Then the hangover is something else she hated.

        “I’m never drinking again.” She addresses firmly, pressing a hand to her head.

        “You sure? Seemed like you had a pretty good reason to last night.” Mark second guesses her statement, and she did have a pretty good reason. But [Y/N] didn’t answer, not wanting to dig herself further into the hole she was already in.

        “When’s there never a good reason to drink?” [Y/N] replies, beating around the bushes with her answer.

        “You’re not wrong you know. I was gonna ask you if you wanted to go out for dinner and a drink but, dinner might just be best for you.” Mark joked, making her laugh a bit.

        “Yeah, that’d be nice.” [Y/N] nodded.

        “Good, I have your number anyways, but I need to go home and feed my dogs before they find a way to get into my fridge.” Says Mark which makes [Y/N] think about where her phone is actually located.

        “Aw, what sort of dogs do you have?” She asks out of curiosity.

Mark pulls his phone out from his back pocket, pressing the lock button to illuminate the screen, revealing a photo of two beautiful long-haired German shepherds.

        “God they’re gorgeous!” [Y/N] exclaimed. 

         “Yeah, love’em to bits, maybe after dinner if you want, we can swing past mine and you can meet them.” He suggests.

        “Don’t even need to ask me twice.” She says.

        “Alright then, it’s a date.” Mark winks across at her, butterflies erupting in her stomach.

[Y/N] sees Marks to the door after he gets his stuff together. Giving him a wave from the front of her apartment as he jumps into his ride home, the car pulling away from the curb only to be replaced by a blacked-out Range Rover that sped from down the street. Now the only blacked out Range Rover in this town was owned by Harry, unless there was someone else behind the wheel. So immediately when she spots the vehicle her hearts climbing its way up her throat. She pays close attention when the driver’s seat door of the car opens, spotting brown curly hair with a pair of Ray Bans on. It was Harry.

Before he was even halfway up the small pavement to her door, [Y/N] slams it shut, heart racing and beating loudly. She thought, what the actual fuck is he doing here? Of course, shutting the door did absolutely nothing. Harry forced it right open and walked straight in like he was on his own property, staring directly across the way at [Y/N].

        “Get the fuck out.” She demands in a low voice. 

          “Chill out would’ya? Came to drop off your phone.” Harry’s response was bitter.

          “How the hell did get my phone?” She shoves with the question. 

        “Do you want it back or not?” Harry presses on, holding it out to her. It didn’t take her long to walk up to him and snatch the device right out of his possession, not even saying ‘thank you’.

        “Go.” [Y/N] points carelessly to the door behind him.

        “Wanted to ask how you are too.” Harry’s mood changed within a split second, going from some sort of an arrogant prick to a supposedly concerned person. 

Either way, it made [Y/N] extremely confused and more infuriated with him. All it did was the fuel the fire Harry started last night. Had he not incoherently asked [Y/N] to meet him upstairs, this mess wouldn’t have gotten any worse. [Y/N] wouldn’t have a hangover and she wouldn’t be this repulsed by his actions. Unfortunately, that’s the way it was.

        “I said go Harry, that’s not an invitation for you to ask how I’m doing.” [Y/N] barges past his well-built body, holding the door open for him in hopes that he’d just leave and never return.

        “Too bad we need to talk anyways.” Harry pulls the side of the door from her hand and shuts it closed before walking off like he runs the place.

She follows him around as he stands on the opposite side of the lounge with her hands on her hips, wondering what he’s about to do. [Y/N] couldn’t believe that his was happening. One, she wasn’t expecting Harry to show up let alone shove himself through her house. And two, there was a part of her that still really missed Harry, so seeing him only fed into that.

        “We don’t need to talk. We both made things pretty clear-“

        “Did we? I mean really, we fucked, then both walked out on each other without even saying that this was the end of us, correct?” Harry interrupts her with the alarming truth. 

        “Spare me the details – tell me what you want or get out.” [Y/N] demands.

        “Just want to know your status with Mark” Harry almost replies instantly.

        “Not that it’s any of your fucking business but if you need to know then him and I are just taking things casual.” [Y/N] wasn’t very confident or assertive in what she said. She didn’t know how the future was going to pan out between her and Mark, nor did she really care at this point in time.

        “How do you know Mark anyways?” [Y/N] asks him.

        “You know I know a lot of people [Y/N].” Harry says, in which most cases, he is correct. Harry most likely knew the tenants of the house of the party last night that could’ve possibly led him to be invited in the first place.

There were a few moments of silence between the pair as they stood aimlessly in her living room, wondering what the next step is from there. “Alright well, you gotta go Harry.” [Y/N] shakes her head. 

        “I’m not done.” Harry ignores her request, standing his ground. “Are you really over me?” He asks, this time with a little hurt in his voice. 

His words felt like they hit her in the stomach, knocking the air right out of her lungs. [Y/N] never spent that much time thinking about if she’s over him. The thoughts were more so; ‘I need to hurry up and get over him.’ There was no in between. Now that she comes to think of it, [Y/N] misses Harry, deeply. Watching him being touched by someone else felt like she was set on fire which was her very reaction when she was who Harry was about to sleep with. But overall, there was no way that she was over Harry. Everything that he was, [Y/N] loved about him down to his flaws. The best thing about him is that he did the exact same for her. 

        “After just about watching you fuck someone else in front of my own eyes, yeah I’d say I’m pretty well over you.” [Y/N] replies harshly, beating around the bush with her answer.

Deep down, Harry regretted that action, a lot. He was so caught up in getting back at her – to force her to see what it would be like without him and having sex with him wasn’t even the biggest portion of that. Harry was that conniving that when he re-evaluates that situation he thinks its evil. He hated himself with a passion for doing that, then again, he knew what she had been up to as well. But Harry knew that, that wasn’t an excuse to do that to her because he knew that [Y/N] would never do that to him. So, in some ways, he was angry at himself and then angry at her.

        “You think I don’ know that you’ve been fucking other guys!” Harry snaps unexpectedly.

[Y/N] nearly jumps out of her own skin. One thing [Y/N] didn’t miss about Harry is how angry he can get. It was very, very rare but when it happened, she’d linger on how he lashed out. He would get louder than usual and he’s only ever yelled at her a few times and had been extremely apologetic about it, but not like this. This was somewhere out of his anger.

        “Thas’ right, I know. One of your so-called friends been telling me who you’ve been fuckin’.” Harry grits.

        “At least I never fucked any of them in front of you!” She has no trouble in raising her voice with the same amount of volume as he did.

They both took a pause, Harry having to reconsider his words and actions which left him in the wrong here. All Harry’s excuse would’ve been was the miscommunication between the two when they were freshly split. Even then, it was still hard to tell what place they were in.

       “Look I never meant for you to see…that.” Harry shakes his head with regret.

        “Nah, you deliberately meant for me to see that. You looked me right in the eye Harry when it happened Harry.” [Y/N] was at her tipping point, wanting to just bawl and cry if only he weren’t in front of her. Harry stares at the ground, pondering over it again like it was on replay.

        “When you wanted me to meet you upstairs, I thought we were going to work something out. I thought we could do something about whatever the fuck was happening between us. I was willing to give this another shot.” Tears were brimming hers and Harry’s eyes as [Y/N] spoke on and he could just tell where this was going.

He had suspected it for a while but would always ignore the fact that they should officially end it on their words. Aside from that, Harry was beating himself up inside after [Y/N] said that she was willing to talk things out with him. If he hadn’t of asked his mistress to follow and sleep with him upstairs in front of [Y/N], things could’ve been different at the time being.

        “It’s not too late y’know.” Harry takes one step closer to her as she takes one step back. Her head is furiously shaking.

        “No, I-I don’t wanna…” [Y/N] lets out in a shaky voice, crossing her arms lowly.

He could’ve sworn he heard his heart break just then, a few tears straying away down his face. Harry wipes his eyes with the back of his sweaters sleeve and sniffs. This was never supposed to happen, he thought. They were supposed to be forever in love, get married, start a family and grow old together. There was absolutely nobody else in the world that he wanted to be with besides her and the fact that [Y/N] couldn’t see that happening anymore, broke Harry further.

        “Please baby, don’t do this.” Harry’s eyes shut, a couple of more tears rolling down his warm skin. “We can start over n’ forget this mess.” He continues to plead.

        “It’s already forgotten.” [Y/N] chokes.

        “Bye Harry.”

        “Please baby, don’t do this.” Harry’s eyes shut, a couple of more tears rolling down his warm skin. “We can start over n’ forget this mess.” He continues to plead.

        “It’s already forgotten.” [Y/N] chokes.

        “Bye Harry.”

summary: Literally just woke up from a dream about bailing on my wedding to a random guy. I was panicking while on my way to the hotel to...
body:
Literally just woke up from a dream about bailing on my wedding to a random guy. I was panicking while on my way to the hotel to get married and then I just called everyone and I was like:

Then I drove home with my sister and we went shopping LOL WHAT THE HECK WAS THIS DREAM. I had horses with a carriage ready to go to drive me there. It was at a hotel that was super fancy. BUT I HAD NO IDEA WHO THE GUY I WAS MARRYING WAS. And my dad was like “you need to get married, for the family and you already have everything ready here” and I was like:

I mean…this whole dream was a mess from the start…but we all know that I would marry Harry in a swamp during a tornado, so sorry random dude…I couldn’t do it LOL
